Sexual assaults over the last 12 months are <h8>`r ifelse(sexassaults_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12>=0," up"," down")` `r ifelse(sexassaults_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12>=0,sexassaults_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12,substring(sexassaults_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12,2))`%</h8> compared to the annual average over the last three years, according to the latest Los Angeles Police Department data through `r format(lapd_asofdate, "%B %d")`.

The areas of the county policed by the LAPD and Sheriff's Department averaged <h8>`r round(sexassaults_city$last12mos/52,0)`</h8> sexual assaults a week over the last 12 months. In 2019, that number was <h8>`r round(sexassaults_city$'2019'/52,0)`</h8> a week.

<subhead>A closer look at Los Angeles sexual assaults neighborhood by neighborhood</subhead>

The danger is not the same neighborhood to neighborhood. ABC7's data team looked at data from the Los Angeles Police Department by neighborhood from 2019 through `r format(lapd_asofdate, "%B %d, %Y")`, the latest date for which records are available from the two agencies.

The map color codes each area by the sexual assault rate over the last 12 months. The three darker blue areas are neighborhoods with sexual assault rates higher than the citywide rate. You can also choose to see neighborhoods by the number of reported sexual assaults.

Click on any area to see detailed numbers or the buttons at the bottom of the map to switch between numbers and rates. 

You can find your neighborhood by using the box at the top of the map to search for any street, place, landmark or zip code to zoom to that location or search the table below the map to view and compare data by area over more than a decade.

Choose a different crime to explore in the county:

```{r cars, echo=FALSE,out.width='100%',out.height='750'}
# sexassault MAP

# Set bins for numbers of crimes for sexassaults map
sexassaultbins1 <- c(0,
                20,
                30,
                40,
                50,
                150)
sexassaultbins2 <- c(0,
                10,
                25,
                50,
                100,
                150)
sexassaultpal1 <- colorBin(c("#aecfe6",
                             "#2787d6",
                             "#0058f6",
                             "#003ca6",
                             "#00215c"), sexassaults_district$rate_last12, bins = sexassaultbins1,na.color = "#51585f")

sexassaultpal2 <- colorBin(c("#aecfe6",
                             "#2787d6",
                             "#0058f6",
                             "#003ca6",
                             "#00215c"), sexassaults_district$last12mos, bins = sexassaultbins2,na.color = "#51585f")

# Create quick labels for sexassaults map
sexassaultlabel <- paste(sep="",
                     "<popuptitle>",
                     sexassaults_district$last12mos,
                     " sexual assaults</popuptitle><br>",
                     " in the last 12 months in the <b>",
                     sexassaults_district$district,
                     "</b>area, home to an estimated ",
                     prettyNum(sexassaults_district$population, big.mark=","),
                     " people.
<br>
<table>      
      <tr>
				<th></th>
				<th>Total</th>
				<th>Rate</th>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td>2019</td>
				<td>",
sexassaults_district$`2019`,
"</td>
				<td>",
sexassaults_district$rate19,
"</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td>2020</td>
				<td>",
sexassaults_district$`2020`,
"</td>
				<td>",
sexassaults_district$rate20,
"</td>
			</tr>
						<tr>
				<td>2021</td>
				<td>",
sexassaults_district$`2021`,
"</td>
				<td>",
sexassaults_district$rate21,
"</td>
			</tr>
						<tr>
				<td>Last 12 months</td>
				<td>",
sexassaults_district$last12mos,
"</td>
				<td>",
sexassaults_district$rate_last12,
"</td>
			</tr>
						<tr>
				<td>3-year Average</td>
				<td>",
sexassaults_district$avg_prior3years,
"</td>
				<td>",
sexassaults_district$rate_prior3years,
"</td>
			</tr>
</table>")

# Creating police beats map for types of crimes
losangeles_sexassault_map <- leaflet(sexassaults_district, options = leafletOptions(zoomControl = FALSE, zoomSnap = 0.5, zoomDelta=0.5)) %>%
  htmlwidgets::onRender("function(el, x) {
L.control.zoom({ position: 'topright' }).addTo(this)
}") %>%
  setView(-118.362, 34.09, zoom = 11) %>% 
  addProviderTiles(provider = "Esri.WorldImagery") %>%
  addProviderTiles(provider = "CartoDB.PositronOnlyLabels") %>%
  addPolygons(color = "white", 
              popup = sexassaultlabel,
              popupOptions = popupOptions(maxWidth ="200", 
                                          minWidth ="200"),
              weight = 2, 
              smoothFactor = 0.5,
              opacity = 0.6, 
              fillOpacity = 0.6,
              fillColor = ~sexassaultpal1(rate_last12),
              group="Rate") %>% 
    addPolygons(color = "white", 
              popup = sexassaultlabel,
              popupOptions = popupOptions(maxWidth ="200", 
                                          minWidth ="200"),
              weight = 2, 
              smoothFactor = 0.5,
              opacity = 0.6, 
              fillOpacity = 0.6,
              fillColor = ~sexassaultpal2(last12mos),
              group="Number") %>% 
  addSearchOSM(options = searchOptions(autoCollapse=TRUE, collapsed = FALSE, minLength = 3, zoom=13, position="topleft")) %>%
    onRender("function(el, x) {
        $('input.search-input')[0].placeholder = 'Search street, place or zip code'
        }") %>%
  addLegend(opacity = 0.6,
            values = sexassaults_district$rate_last12, 
            pal = sexassaultpal1,
            position = "bottomleft", 
            title = paste(sep="","<popuptitle>Sexual Assault Rate<br><popupchatter>Sexual Assaults/100K people<br>Citywide: ",sexassaults_city$rate_last12),
            group = "Rate",
            className = "info legend Rate") %>%
  addLegend(opacity = 0.6,
            values = sexassaults_district$last12mos, 
            pal = sexassaultpal2,
            position = "bottomleft", 
            title = paste(sep="","<popuptitle>Sexual Assaults<br><popupchatter>Total sexual assaults<br>Citywide: ",sexassaults_city$last12mos),
            group = "Number",
            className = "info legend Number") %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("Rate","Number"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE),
    position = 'bottomright') %>% hideGroup(c("Number")) %>%
   htmlwidgets::onRender("
      function(el, x) {
         var updateLegend = function () {
            var selectedGroup = document.querySelectorAll('input:checked')[0].nextSibling.innerText.substr(1);

            document.querySelectorAll('.legend').forEach(a => a.hidden=true);
            document.querySelectorAll('.legend').forEach(l => {
               if (l.classList.contains(selectedGroup)) l.hidden=false;
            });
         };
         updateLegend();
         this.on('baselayerchange', el => updateLegend());
      }"
   )
losangeles_sexassault_map
```
